Effects.label: Weapon destroyed
Effects.descr: The weapon is irreparably destroyed. If the weapon is indestructible this result must be treated like 'weapon lost'.

Effects.label: Weapon heavily damaged
Effects.descr: The weapon cannot be used anymore until repaired. If the wepaon is indestructible this result must be treated like 'weapon lost'.

Effects.label: Weapon damaged
Effects.descr: The weapon is damaged. All checks on ranged combat have a disadvantage of 4 until repaired. If the wepaon is indestructible this result must be treated like 'weapon lost'.

Effects.label: Weapon lost
Effects.descr: The weapon fell to the ground.

Effects.label: Weapon stuck
Effects.descr: The weapon got stuck in a tree, the ground, or anything else. An action with a disadvatage of 1 on 'Feat of Strength' (dragging & pulling) is required.

Effects.label: Shield destroyed
Effects.descr: The shield  is irreparably destroyed. If the shield is indestructible this result must be treated like 'shield lost'.

Effects.label: Shield heavily damaged
Effects.descr: The shield cannot be used anymore until repaired. If the shield is indestructible this result must be treated like 'shield lost'.

Effects.label: Shield damaged
Effects.descr: The shield is damaged. All checks on attack and parry get a disadvantage of 2 until repaired.  If the shield is indestructible this result must be treated like 'shield lost'.

Effects.label: Shield lost
Effects.descr: The shield fell to the ground.

Effects.label: Shield stuck
Effects.descr: The shield got stuck in a tree, the ground, or anything else. An action with a disadvatage of 1 on 'Feat of Strength' (dragging & pulling) is required.

Effects.label: Hit of companion/bystander
Effects.descr: The projectile by accident hits a friend or a bystander. Is such a goal close by this result will be handled like 'self-imposed wound'. The weapon damage is determined including the weapon's bonus.

Effects.label: Miss
Effects.descr: A spectacular miss hits an object (a shop sign has been shot down, a glass window broke etc.).

Effects.label: Pulled muscle
Effects.descr: The character has back pain and endures one level of 'pain' for the next 3 rounds.

Effects.label: Slipped string/ Improper grip of weapon/ Jammed
Effects.descr: The hero needs 2 complete combat rounds to make it ready again.

Effects.label: Too focused
Effects.descr: The hero is so focused on aiming at the target that they lose defense roles until the next action.

Effects.label: Self-imposed wound
Effects.descr: The hero hurt themselves and suffers damage. The damage is determined including the weapon bonus.

Effects.label: Self-imposed serious wound
Effects.descr: Serious self-injury. The damage shall be determined including the weapon bonus and doubled.

Effects.label: Tumble
Effects.descr: The hero stumbles and falls unless a check on 'Body Control' (Balance) with a disadvantage of 2 succeeds. If not the hero suffers the state 'Prone'.

Effects.label: Stumble
Effects.descr: The hero stumbles and the next action suffers a disadvantage of 2.

Effects.label: Twisted foot
Effects.descr: The hero receives the condition 'Pain' for 3 combat rounds.

Effects.label: Head bump
Effects.descr: The hero hit the head. One level of 'Stupor' for one hour.

Effects.label: Swapped souls
Effects.descr: The mind of the wizard switches places with the nearest life form larger than a rat for 1d6 days.

Effects.label: Minor spirit
Effects.descr: A minor spirit will persecute the wizard for 1d6 days.

Effects.label: New traget
Effects.descr: The target of the action changes at the game masters discretion.

Effects.label: Transformation
Effects.descr: The wizard is transformed into a small animal at the game masters discretion for 1d6 hours.

Effects.label: Deflagration
Effects.descr: The total supply of arcane energy leaves the body and manifests itself as a rain of colourful sparkles, butterfly illusions and tiny rainbows. The lost energy regenerates regularly.

Effects.label: Magic block
Effects.descr: For 1d6 days the wizard loses the ability to access his/her supply of arcane energy.

Effects.label: Headache
Effects.descr: The wizard has a throbbing headache for 1d6 days. They suffer of 1 level of stupor during that time.

Effects.label: Astral drain
Effects.descr: The available supply of leaves the body and moves to the nearest target with magical abilities. The target receives the total supply even if it exceeds the natural maximum. The lost energy regenerates regularly.

Effects.label: Mute
Effects.descr: The hero loses the ability to speak.

Effects.label: Colourful hair
Effects.descr: All hair inclusing a beard gets multi coloured. Re-growing hair returns in it's original colour.

Effects.label: Warning
Effects.descr: An ethereal voice appears out of nothing and says 'Never do that again!'

Effects.label: Fire
Effects.descr: Flammable materials in a radius of 2d6 meters burst in flames (except for living beings and the clothes of the Blessed One).

Effects.label: Inversion
Effects.descr: The chant has the oppostite effect. Banish Light creates lights, a health blessing causes damage, etc.

Effects.label: Visions und nightmares
Effects.descr: For 1d6 days the Blessed One has strange visions and nightmares during nights.

Effects.label: Intimidated
Effects.descr: A glance through the spheres intimidates the Blessed One in a way that he receives 3 levels of the state fear.

Effects.label: Karma block
Effects.descr: For 1d6 days the Blessed One loses the ability to access his/her supply of karma points.

Effects.label: Rapture
Effects.descr: The Blessed One receives 4 levels of rapture for 1 day.

Effects.label: Confusion
Effects.descr: The Blessed One is confused for one day and talks incomprehensible stuff he won't remember later. 3 levels confusion.

Effects.label: Stigmatised
Effects.descr: The Blessed One carries a stigma for 1 day.

Effects.label: Firmly rooted
Effects.descr: The Blessed One takes root in the ground and cannot move their feet for 1d6 minutes. During that time s/he has the state 'bound'.
